title: Mount&Blade Crusader Mod for v0.903
description:
To play this mode you need download and install Mount&Blade base v.0.903.
 <a href="
http://www.taleworlds.net/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.taleworlds.net/</a>

This is my first Mode I did,so may have a bugs(don`t have a time to testing)
plz write me if you find a bugs.

1.Install:
unrar the file to your c:\...\mount&blade\modules\   directory

2. in autorun menu choose "Crusader".

3.changes:
.New map
.2 factions: "Catholic", "Muslim".
.new bandits
.new sounds and music
.bandits can attack you together.
.Lot of new texture
.Leaders have historical names
.Possible capturing leaders
.when join the battle you can choose the side to attack
,reduce siege time
and more things, iI just don`t remember

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
file size 130Mb
Have fun !
